item.description:
Dear Members,

I don't know which was more disappointing, having to cancel the Maltese Meet this past Sunday or watching the weather turn out to be much less threatening (at least in the western suburbs) during that afternoon than I expected!!!! I wish we could have had the Meet - it would have been a huge lift from a gloomy day!

Our next meet is in a few weeks, May 6th. As usual it will run from 1-4pm. Once again, we're inviting Lisa Cutter to serve as our Dog Activity Director to run fun things for our dogs to do while we relax, chat, eat and watch.

As a result, we will charge $10 for the Meet this time so that we can hire Lisa as well as buy the usual food and pay for the dog class ring rental!

Let me know if you can come!

Maltese best,
Kim

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: May 6 Boston Maltese Meet, 1-4pm, Sudbury, MA
